mapper.select: select MENU_ID as menuId, MENU_NAME as menuName, MENU_DESC as menuDesc, REQ_URL as reqUrl, FONTAWE_CSS as fontaweCss from ea_admin_menu_conf where PARENT_MENU_ID = 0 and DELETED = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into ea_admin_menu_conf (MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_DESC, REQ_URL, PARENT_MENU_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETED, CREATOR, FONTAWE_CSS, SHOW_MENU) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentMenuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fontaweCss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showMenu,jdbcType=CHAR})
